title: [Lumnis' Temple, West Alcove]
description: Along the curved wall of this crescent-shaped room, a panoramic image of a furious battle has been frescoed from floor to ceiling.  Across the room, paned windows allow sunlight to cascade across the scene, adding depth and movement, as if the images were alive.
